InformativeText.Summary: Nordic Device Firmware Update (DFU) Service exposes necessary information to perform Device Firmware Update on the device. NOTE: This is not a service defined by the Bluetooth SIG, a proprietary one to demonstrate a typical firmware update on an nRF51 device.

Dependencies.Dependency: This service has no dependencies on other GATT-based services.

Characteristic.name: DFU Packet
Characteristic.InformativeText: This characteristic receives firmware to nRF51 device as DFU Packets. The firmware is transferred by writing each fragment as DFU Packet to this characteristic. Size of each packet is in range of 1 to (ATT_MTU - 3).

Characteristic.name: DFU Control Point
Characteristic.InformativeText: All DFU Procedures are requested using this characteristic. A DFU Procedure request is initiated by writing to this characteristic.
